installCommand: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
buildCommand: npm run build --prefix frontend && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src=path.join('frontend','dist'); const dest=path.join('.vercel','output','static'); fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});"
